arts.ttl: How 'terrific' Palace used 3-4-3 system to beat Brighton
arts.sum: Former England midfielder Danny Murphy analyses how Crystal Palace's "game intelligence and quality" were key in the 3-4-3 system they used to beat Brighton.

arts.ttl: The lowdown on Crystal Palace 2 Brighton 1 - Eagles record league double over rivals as Nketiah and Guehi see red in chaotic last period
arts.sum: Palace: Henderson, Munoz, Lerma, Lacroix (Ward 90), Guehi, Mitchell (Chilwell 63), Kamada, Wharton (Hughes 82), Eze (Devenny 82), Sarr, Mateta (Nketiah 82). Van Hecke was sent off for a second yellow card in added time, but Palace saw out the game to record a league double over their rivals.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace boss asked if Maxence Lacroix was substituted with concussion in win against Brighton
arts.sum: Oliver Glasner said the fourth official Sam Allison gave the all clear for Crystal Palace to have an extra substitution slot to take off Maxence Lacroix in their 2-1 win over Brighton on Saturday. “We had three windows already, but we were allowed to do so and bring on an extra substitute.

arts.ttl: Nine-man Palace hold on to beat Brighton and extend unbeaten run
arts.sum: The striker found the net for a third successive Premier League home game, with what was Palace's quickest goal in the top flight this season at two minutes and 19 seconds. Oliver Glasner ’s side move up a place to 11th and four points off eighth-place Brighton, who also had Jan Paul van Hecke sent off in stoppage time and suffered only their second defeat in nine away games.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace boss asked about Guehi and Nketiah red card decisions in win over Brighton
arts.sum: Palace were reduced to nine men in the 90th minute when Guehi was shown a second yellow card for a reckless foul on Brajan Gruda. Oliver Glasner said Marc Guehi could do with some rest after being issued a red card in Crystal Palace’s 2-1 win over Brighton.

arts.ttl: Three red cards & wild celebrations - why are Palace & Brighton rivals?
arts.sum: After another chaotic meeting between the two, BBC Sport explains why Crystal Palace and Brighton are such bitter rivals.

arts.ttl: Eze praises Palace mentality after dramatic win over Brighton
arts.sum: Ebere Eze claimed two assists during a remarkable win over arch-rivals Brighton on Saturday afternoon as Crystal Palace claimed a memorable win.

arts.ttl: Concern for Oliver Glasner as Crystal Palace suffer double blow ahead of Man City Premier League clash
arts.sum: Crystal Palace will be without two first-team players for their Premier League trip to Manchester City on April 12.

arts.ttl: Oliver Glasner delighted with ‘dramatic’ win as nine-man Palace beat Brighton
I saw how Fabian Hurzeler reacted after Jan Paul van Hecke's red card at Crystal Palace - it said everything
arts.sum: Brighton boss pinpoints reason for defeat at Selhurst Park
